Package de.unisb.cs.st.javaslicer.tracer.instrumentation

Class PauseTracingInstrumenter

java.lang.Object
de.unisb.cs.st.javaslicer.tracer.instrumentation.PauseTracingInstrumenter
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.objectweb.asm.Opcodes
public class PauseTracingInstrumenter
extends Object
implements org.objectweb.asm.Opcodes
This class instruments methods to stop tracing as soon as the method is entered and continue when it is left (either by a return statement or by a thrown exception).
Author:
Clemens Hammacher
